summary.span: 命名空间包含用于在设计时创建组件的自定义用户界面行为的类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes for creating custom user interface behavior for components at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下列表显示此命名空间中包含的类：The following list shows the classes included in this namespace: - A类，用于处理的绘制和命中测试。A class for handling painting and hit-testing. - 类，用于管理一套对象。An class for managing a collection of objects. - A类，用于管理在设计器中的自定义用户界面。A class for managing the custom user interface in a designer. - A表示水平和垂直线段帮助用户在设计时对齐组件的类。A class that represents horizontal and vertical line segments that assist users in aligning components at design time.
